PlatformFee.name: ContractPlatformFee
PlatformFee.remarks: Configure platform fees for a contract, which can be applied on certain paid transactions

PrimarySale.name: ContractPrimarySale
PrimarySale.remarks: Configure primary sale recipients for an entire contract.

Permissions.name: ContractRoles
Permissions.remarks: Configure roles and permissions for a contract, to restrict certain actions.

methods.name: get
methods.summary: Call this to get a list of addresses that are members of a specific role.
methods.remarks: See {@link ContractRoles.getAll} to get get a list of addresses for all supported roles on the contract.

examples.javascript: const minterAddresses: string[] = await contract.getRoleMemberList("minter");

methods.name: setAll
methods.summary:
Call this to OVERWRITE the list of addresses that are members of specific roles.

Every role in the list will be overwritten with the new list of addresses provided with them. If you want to add or remove addresses for a single address use {@link ContractRoles.grant} and {@link ContractRoles.revoke} respectively instead.

Royalty.name: ContractRoyalty
Royalty.remarks: Configure royalties for an entire contract or a particular token.

ERC1155.name: Erc1155
ERC1155.remarks: Basic functionality for a ERC1155 contract that handles IPFS storage for you.

examples.javascript:
const contract = sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.edition.transfer(walletAddress, tokenId, quantity);

methods.name: airdrop
methods.remarks: Airdrop one or multiple NFTs to the provided wallet addresses.

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get a wallets NFT balance (number of NFTs in this contract owned by the wallet).

examples.javascript: const nft = await contract.get("0");

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer an NFT from the connected wallet to another wallet.

ERC1155Enumerable.name: Erc1155Enumerable
ERC1155Enumerable.remarks: Easily list all the NFTs in a ERC1155 contract.

examples.javascript:
const contract = sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
const nfts = await contract.edition.query.all();

methods.name: all
methods.remarks:
Get all the data associated with every NFT in this contract.

By default, returns the first 100 NFTs, use queryParams to fetch more.

examples.javascript: const nfts = await contract.edition.query.all();

methods.name: owned
methods.remarks: Get all the data associated with the NFTs owned by a specific wallet.

ERC20.name: Erc20
ERC20.remarks: Basic functionality for a ERC20 contract that handles all unit transformation for you.

examples.javascript:
const contract = sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.token.transfer(walletAddress, amount);

methods.name: allowance
methods.remarks: Get the allowance of a 'spender' wallet over the connected wallet's funds - the allowance of a different address for a token is the amount of tokens that the `spender` wallet is allowed to spend on behalf of the connected wallet.

methods.name: allowanceOf
methods.remarks: Get the allowance of one wallet over another wallet's funds - the allowance of a different address for a token is the amount of tokens that the wallet is allowed to spend on behalf of the specified wallet.

methods.name: balance
methods.summary: Get Token Balance for the currently connected wallet

examples.javascript:
const balance = await contract.balance();
console.log(balance);

methods.name: get
methods.summary: Get the token Metadata (name, symbol, etc...)

examples.javascript: const token = await contract.get();

methods.name: setAllowance
methods.summary: Allows the specified `spender` wallet to transfer the given `amount` of tokens to another wallet

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer tokens from the connected wallet to another wallet.

methods.name: transferBatch
methods.remarks: Mint tokens from the connected wallet to many wallets

methods.name: transferFrom
methods.remarks: Transfer tokens from one wallet to another

ERC721.name: Erc721
ERC721.remarks: Basic functionality for a ERC721 contract that handles IPFS storage for you.

examples.javascript:
const contract = sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.nft.transfer(walletAddress, tokenId);

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get a wallets NFT balance (number of NFTs in this contract owned by the wallet).

examples.javascript:
const tokenId = 0;
const nft = await contract.get(tokenId);

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer an NFT from the connected wallet to another wallet.

ERC721BatchMintable.name: Erc721BatchMintable
ERC721BatchMintable.summary: Mint Many ERC721 NFTs at once
ERC721BatchMintable.remarks: NFT batch minting functionality that handles IPFS storage for you.

examples.javascript:
const contract = sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.nft.mint.batch.to(walletAddress, [nftMetadata1, nftMetadata2, ...]);

methods.name: to
methods.remarks: Mint many unique NFTs at once to a specified wallet.

ERC721Enumerable.name: Erc721Enumerable
ERC721Enumerable.remarks: Easily list all the NFTs from a ERC721 contract, owned by a certain wallet.

methods.name: all
methods.remarks: Get all the data associated with the NFTs owned by a specific wallet.

ERC721Mintable.name: Erc721Mintable
ERC721Mintable.remarks: NFT minting functionality that handles IPFS storage for you.

examples.javascript:
const contract = sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.nft.mint.to(walletAddress, nftMetadata);

methods.name: to
methods.remarks: Mint a unique NFT to a specified wallet.

ERC721Supply.name: Erc721Supply
ERC721Supply.remarks: Easily list all the NFTs in a ERC721 contract.

examples.javascript:
const contract = sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
const nfts = await contract.nft.query.all();

methods.name: all
methods.remarks:
Get all the data associated with every NFT in this contract.

By default, returns the first 100 NFTs, use queryParams to fetch more.

examples.javascript: const nfts = await contract.query.all();
